programArgsList: CREATE TABLE products_on_hand (quantity INT, product_id INT, event_time TIMESTAMP(3) METADATA FROM 'value.source.timestamp' VIRTUAL,  WATERMARK FOR event_time AS event_time - INTERVAL '5' SECOND ) WITH ( 'connector' = 'kafka','topic'     = 'fridayeleven.inventory.products_on_hand', 'properties.bootstrap.servers' = 'localhost:9093', 'properties.group.id' = '9310', 'properties.sasl.mechanism' = 'SCRAM-SHA-256',  'properties.security.protocol' = 'SASL_PLAINTEXT',  'properties.sasl.jaas.config' = 'org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.ScramLoginModule required username=fridayeleven password=X32+lVL+Vdjz+UCa09F9UkDVpguCmkRSAf3qw3Xcm94=;',  'debezium-json.schema-include' = 'true',  'scan.startup.mode' = 'earliest-offset', 'format'    = 'debezium-json')
SELECT SUM(quantity) as summed FROM products_on_hand;

CREATE TABLE products_on_hand_output (summed INT) WITH ('connector' = 'kafka','topic' = 'fridayeleven.inventory.products_on_hand_output','properties.bootstrap.servers' = 'localhost:9093', 'properties.sasl.mechanism' = 'SCRAM-SHA-256',  'properties.security.protocol' = 'SASL_PLAINTEXT',  'properties.sasl.jaas.config' = 'org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.ScramLoginModule required username=fridayeleven password=X32+lVL+Vdjz+UCa09F9UkDVpguCmkRSAf3qw3Xcm94=;', 'format' = 'debezium-json')
